snippet.title: Warframe | Update 31.5: Eximus Rework Dev Workshop Video
snippet.description:
As part of our upcoming update, Angels of the Zariman, we are reworking one of the oldest foes in the game: Eximus units! Introduced in Update 12, Eximus units were added as ‘Enemy Leaders,’ meant to bolster their allies with improved stats and support abilities. While that core design intention still rings true, we felt it was time they were given a refresh to bring them up to speed both in terms of their gameplay and their appearance in-game!

Angels of the Zariman will be available on all platforms on April 27, 2022. 

For complete details on everything discussed in this video, be sure to follow the links below:

Eximus Dev Workshop: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1305472-eximus-reborn-dev-workshop/

Focus Rework Dev Workshop: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1304698-focus-school-system-rework-a-broad-overview/

Angels of the Zariman Overview: https://www.warframe.com/news/angels-of-the-zariman

0:00 Eximus Reborn Intro
0:30 Rework Objectives
1:00 Overguard 
2:00 Visual & Audio Indicators
2:15 Blitz Eximus Units
2:45 Energy Leech Units
3:25 Guardian Eximus Units 
3:55 Leech / Sanguine
4:21 Shock / Bio-electric 
5:00 Arson / Caustic
5:35 Venomous Eximus units 
6:00 Arctic / Frozen
6:10 Rewards Boost 
6:28 Summary

#Warframe #DevWorkshop #TennoGuide
